comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This is John A. Hennessy, who offered testimony in New York State concerning alleged Tammany corruption in the awarding of congracts for construction of the New York State Barge Canal. Story in the New York Times, November 2, 1913: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D06E5DB1E3BE6... Another Bain/LOC portrait of John A. Hennessy: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4408107069/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_A._Hennessy
